fields.name: General
fields.value:
• With average luck, a player can get around 8 shards in 200 spins (4 from spins, and 4 from chests).
• The average cost for 200 spins is 19440 gems.
• The first spin is always free.
• On day 2~7 of the event, the first spin costs 60 gems __if you do not have any unused Raffle Ticket__.
• You can save unused Raffle Ticket for future Wheel events.

fields.name: Best Strategy
fields.value:
• Have around 19,440 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do 200 spins. The average shard cost is 2,430 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>
• Have around 97,200 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do ~1000 spins. The average shard cost (after the first 200 spins) is 4,860 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>
• If you aren't after the hero and just want Super Card Vouchers, have around 5,000 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do 50 spins.
• Distribute your spins and make sure you use all Raffle Tickets each day so you can take advantage of discount the next day.
